price: (Musa) aravuga ati “Ni Nyagasani w’ibirere n’isi ndetse n’ibiri hagati yabyo, niba mudashidikanya (ko ari We wabiremye ngaho nimumwemere).”
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
